net.librec.recommender

Class FactorizationMachineRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.recommender.AbstractRecommender
      • net.librec.recommender.FactorizationMachineRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recommender
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FMALSRecommender, FMSGDRecommender

    public abstract class FactorizationMachineRecommender
extends AbstractRecommender
    Factorization Machine Recommender Rendle, Steffen, et al., Fast Context-aware Recommendations with Factorization Machines, SIGIR, 2011.
    Author:
    Tang Jiaxi and Ma Chen

      • predict

        protected double predict(int userId,
             int itemId,
             SparseVector x,
             boolean bound)
                  throws LibrecException
        Predict the rating given a sparse appender vector. if bound is true,The predicted rating value will be bounded in [minRate, maxRate]
        Parameters:
        x - the given vector
        userId - the user id
        itemId - the item id
        bound - whether to bound the predicted rating
        Returns:
        predicted rating
        Throws:
        LibrecException - if error occurs
